name: TheLitterScoop
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to updates from Texas Litter Control. Add The Litter Scoop to your briefing. We will bring you up to speed on what is going on in our pawsome organization and what is happening with animal welfare in the Houston area. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Texas Litter Control has 3 high volume spay/neuter/wellness clinics for cats & dogs, 8 cat adoption centers, pet food pantry, a high volume surgeon training program and mentor program for other charities to help open spay neuter clinics. We provide support to local shelters in Harris and Montgomery counties in Texas. TLC is a 501c3 public charity and a Texas Non Profit Corporation.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
